## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description         | Type                         | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------- | ---------------------------- | ----------- |
| `level`  | `level`   | Heading level, 1-6. | `1 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6` | `1`         |
| `size`   | `size`    |                     | `"default" \| "large"`       | `'default'` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description      |
| ---- | ---------------- |
|      | The heading text |
